column5: Been looking... may be the crack cocaine after supper affecting me, but, for the life of me I can't find where to change my avatar.  Thanks in advance.

http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.p...rCP&CODE=00 My Controls  then look on the left side  Personal Profile  . Edit Profile Information . Edit Personal Portal Information . Edit Signature . Edit Avatar Settings . Change Personal Photo . Change Display Name
right above it says "My Controls" Click it and you'll see it on the left
I am half asleep guys. lol.  Thanks.  Jeez, it's staring me right in the face.  I'll leave this here Moose up for now.
'nother long day in the zoo Drew?
